name: Keep this heart alive
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 46 Jam.

One button game about clicking at the right time :)

Keep the heart alive by filling it with your power. Gain power by eating floating blobs. Avoid rectangles. 

There are 11 levels. 

Made with PixiJs

Used Bfxr for sounds and BeepBox for music (my first time making it :D )

On mobile there might be a problem with jumping so the heart will not be reachable..

---

Updt: Turned sound on by default
